1 intro

Dear friends, pitchforkers of the 1st generation.

You have signaled your interest in acquiring a 1st closed beta pitchfork.

In this document you'll find the details how to acquire a pitchfork and a a short intro to the board and the current state.

The original spec

2 how to get one

  • shipping decide how/when to receive the pitchfork
  • if shipping required contact me for shipping costs to your location.
  • decide if you want a kit, or pre-assembled.
  • wire costs of components, +donation for assembly, +shipping costs if needed.
  • wait for delivery :)

The components and parts of the pitchfork cost about 43-44 EUR, the exact details can be gleaned from the BoM (ods). You transfer the money for the parts to: 

removed

or you can use paypal: removed

Wire the money until the 10th of march so we can initiate the order. We'll have it delivered to Budapest, where we (boldx and roland will be probably helping) assemble the pre-assembled pitchforks. Please signal if you want the pitchfork as a kit1 or assembled, if you want assembly, we'd appreciate any extra donations for our assembly labor. When all is packaged well ship it to you, or we arrange some more personal delivery. If you want shipping please send a note, so we can adjust with shipping costs the final price.

3 crowdfunding

I'm a bit hesitant (i hate PR work) but i plan to run a crowdsourcing campaign to release the sources of the HW and the SW for the pitchfork. The pitchfork is already licensed as free software, so you'll receive access to all of this, but i ask you to support my subsistence with not publishing the sources yourself until the threshold for releasing the sources in the crowdfunding is reached.

4 base board

The base board is designed to have the format of a USB stick, 5 buttons for input, a SWD port and a solder jumper for DFU/Firmware mode. There is no casing currently available.

All sources for the kicad design can be found in the xz tarball. In the tarball you can find the baseboard in the root dir, the nokia3310 experimental variant, the relevant datasheets, and my reference for the experimental entropy source.

Any reviews, comments, improvements are welcome.

5 assembly

The boards mostly contain 0603 sized smd components which should be possible to solder by hand. Using a reflow-controller makes the assembly much easier though. If you want you can get yourself a reflowmaster2000+ deluxe pro which should be easy to build even with a soldering iron, and then you can use this to reflow your and other pitchforks.

I plan to do one assembly session in Budapest, and possibly one more in Berlin, i have a reflowmaster2000+ deluxe pro available for donation, but i'd need a microscope, a scope, and someone willing/able to solder smd parts (i'm too clumsy for this) in case they need fixing.

6 firmware

USB Mass storage mode works, you can put in a microSD card and access it as a usb mass storage device. Pitchfork USB mode is done, try it out using pbp. Key exchange is partially implemented (exchange over RF is missing), but already postquantum! (sphincs2, 3 signed newhope4). RF is partially untested due to one of my pitchforks SPI MOSI pins being broken. There's some initial UI on the oled with support of the buttons.

Any help, review, comments, improvements are welcome. I'm gonna focus on the firmware after this order. If you want to help me with this, you want to have a SWD debugger like a blackmagic JTAG probe (free hw design), or an STLink probe (included on many STM based devboards) available, this also allows you to reflash your pitchfork without resoldering the boot jumper into DFU mode.

The toolchain can be built by the tchain.sh script.

In case you want to develop, have a look at pyrsp, which makes development over SWD a breeze, there's a demo available from camp++

7 3310 board

The 3310 board is an experimental variant of the baseboard, replacing the battery, display and extending the keyboard to 16 keys. This format should fit in a nokia 3310 case and interface with the battery and the display. Unfortunately currently the power switches, the USB port, the microSD port and for devs the SWD port need some non-reversible changes to the casing. This could and should be improved. The firmware does not support currently the keyboard nor the display.

8 BoM

The BoM (ods) lists 3 variants, the chinese base board is the cheapest with about 43 eur costs, and this is what will be ordered. The non-chinese variant costs more than 12 eur more, and is for reference if someone wants to order only the parts from mouser/farnell quickly. The 3rd variant is the BoM for the 3310 variant, which differs only slightly from the base variant in components - lacking buttons, OLED, battery, making it also cheaper..

Some parts seem to be near their EOL, so replacements will probably change the price of a board slightly as time passes.

9 Licensing

the board design is CC-SA, the code is GPL 3.0, the sd/ and usb/msc directories contain code derived from code licensed as following: 

THE PRESENT FIRMWARE WHICH IS FOR GUIDANCE ONLY AIMS AT PROVIDING CUSTOMERS
WITH CODING INFORMATION REGARDING THEIR PRODUCTS IN ORDER FOR THEM TO SAVE
TIME. AS A RESULT, STMICROELECTRONICS SHALL NOT BE HELD LIABLE FOR ANY
DIRECT, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WITH RESPECT TO ANY CLAIMS ARISING
FROM THE CONTENT OF SUCH FIRMWARE AND/OR THE USE MADE BY CUSTOMERS OF THE
CODING INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR PRODUCTS.

(c) COPYRIGHT 2011 STMicroelectronics

This code can be disabled by removing the 

-DHAVE_MSC

from the Makefile.

The firmware furthermore links against libsodium(ISC license) and libopencm3 (GPLv3).

10 Roadmap

  • first batch (this now) until end of march/beginning april,
  • crowdfunding for publishing the sources,
  • second batch for camp++, hopefully in 3310 format,
  • hopefully a big order for the congress.

11 Reflowmaster2000plus deluxe PRO

The Reflowmaster2000plus deluxe PRO is reflow controller for your toaster, you need an arduino or a raspi or some other microcontroller and a few common parts. Using the Reflowmaster2000plus deluxe PRO you can then solder your own pitchfork at home.
